title: Chicken Pasta with Mushrooms in Tomato Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['500g spaghetti', 'oil or butter for frying', '8 mushrooms, finely chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, finely chopped', '2 chicken breasts, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '125ml passata', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '125ml light soured cream']
